resources.string:
This product uses publicly available data from Infermedica - Artificial Intelligence in Medical Diagnosis.


	THIS TOOL DOES NOT PROVIDE MEDICAL ADVICE It is intended for informational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis or treatment. Never ignore professional medical advice in seeking treatment because of something you have read on this App. If you think you may have a medical emergency, immediately visit your doctor.

I understand its bad to be ill. Never mind I will help your diagnosis easier. 

Help me out knowing you better. 
Tell me something about you.
We are just one more step away from your diagnosis results. Tell me whats wrong with you. \nSearch for the symptoms and add it to the list.
